priority_ranked_signals.title: Trump Executive Order Challenges State AI Laws - Federal AI Framework
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Immediate regulatory impact on AI industry. Creates federal preemption framework affecting all US AI companies. March 2026 deadlines for FTC and Commerce actions.

priority_ranked_signals.title: WEF Global Risks 2026 - Geoeconomic Confrontation Top Risk
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Authoritative global risk assessment. Geoeconomic confrontation as top risk signals major strategic shift. Economic risks climbing fastest in two years.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Physical AI Dominates CES 2026 - Robots Leave the Screen
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Inflection point for AI industry. Shift from digital to physical AI represents major market transformation. Boston Dynamics Atlas as industry bellwether.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Google Willow Quantum Chip - Exponential Error Reduction at Scale
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Major quantum computing milestone. Exponential error reduction addresses key barrier to fault-tolerant quantum computing. Patents signal commercialization path.

priority_ranked_signals.title: 2026 AI Governance Shift - From Principles to Enforceable Rules
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Global governance paradigm shift. Multi-million dollar penalties under emerging compliance laws. Organizations must prepare documented AI inventories and risk classifications.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Waabi $750M Series C - Largest Canadian Tech Funding for Physical AI
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Record-setting funding validates physical AI market. Unified AI brain for multiple vehicle types signals platform approach gaining traction.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Agentic AI Double-Edged Sword - Automated Arms Race in Cybersecurity
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Critical security paradigm shift. Fully automated attacker-defender arms race represents new threat landscape requiring immediate response.

priority_ranked_signals.title: MIT Technology Review 2026 Breakthrough Technologies - AI Companions Normalized
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: 72% teen adoption signals societal transformation. Emotional AI companions raise profound psychological and ethical questions about human relationships.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Global Economy Shows Resilience but Trade Tensions Cloud Outlook - UN
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Authoritative economic outlook. 2.7% growth forecast below pre-pandemic average. Trade tensions impact becoming evident in 2026.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Harvest Now Decrypt Later - Quantum Threat to Encryption
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Active state-sponsored data collection for future decryption. Critical infrastructure and government communications at risk. Requires immediate cryptographic planning.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Renewable Energy Surge Named 2025 Breakthrough of the Year
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Clean energy inflection point. 2GW solar daily installation vs 1GW annual in 2004. 40% global electricity now clean energy.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AI Adverse Outcomes Surge to Top Long-Term Risk
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Fastest-rising risk in WEF survey. From 30th to 5th place year-over-year. Only 1% of experts expect calm global outlook.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Critical Minerals Supply Chain Risk - China's Rare Earth Dominance
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Strategic vulnerability in technology supply chains. China's willingness to weaponize dominance accelerating supplier diversification globally.

priority_ranked_signals.title: 2025 Third-Hottest Year on Record - Climate Trajectory
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Climate trajectory confirmation. CO2 at 426 ppm (53% above pre-industrial). Ocean heat record for 9th consecutive year.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Labor Market Impacts - Healthy Job Growth Could Reach Zero by 2027
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Fundamental labor market restructuring. Immigration decline changing employment dynamics. Policy implications for workforce planning.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AI Shift from Scaling to Practical Applications in 2026

priority_ranked_signals.title: 72 Countries Propose 1000+ AI Policy Initiatives
